description.full: The Games on Demand version supports English.  Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual".  This game requires a Kinect™ Sensor.  The #1 Hollywood Work Out Can Work for You Too!  From Hollywood to your home, get direct access to the world’s top celebrity trainer, Harley Pasternak. A renowned fitness and nutrition expert and best-selling author, Harley is responsible for getting many of Hollywood’s most recognized celebrities into the best shape of their lives. His scientifically-proven 5-Factor approach balances fitness and diet in one easy-to-manage program that can reveal the A-list physique in all of us!  •Transform your body by training with Harley for 25 minutes a day, five days a week  •Follow Harley’s 5-Factor diet that helps real people get Hollywood results     •Stay motivated with Harley’s performance-based feedback  •Work out with your own weights or with the signature Harley Bar (sold separately)  •Take before and after pictures then share your progress online
description.short: From Hollywood to your home, get direct access to the world’s top celebrity trainer, Harley Pasternak. A renowned fitness and nutrition expert and best-selling author, Harley is responsible for getting many of Hollywood’s most recognized celebrities into the best shape of their lives. His scientifically-proven 5-Factor approach balances fitness and diet in one easy-to-manage program that can reveal the A-list physique in all of us!
